resources.string: Details will appear here after check.

WARNING: This app is for educational purposes only. Unlocking bootloader may void warranty and break your device. Do not update via OTA if you plan to unlock! Manufacturer may have patched the vulnerability and enabled anti-rollback.
This application requires root privileges to perform deep system checks. Please grant root access or use a rooted device.
Unable to determine SoC. This might not be a Unisoc device.
